tool_description: Validates incoming purchase transactions for completeness, format correctness, and business rule compliance before processing for loyalty points.

customer_id.description: Customer identifier associated with the transaction

amount.description: Transaction amount in currency units (must be > 0)

merchant_id.description: Identifier of the merchant where transaction occurred

error_messages: Invalid transaction amount: Amount must be a positive number greater than 0.
Missing required field: All fields (transaction_id, customer_id, amount, merchant_id, transaction_time) must be provided.
Invalid date format: transaction_time must be in ISO 8601 date-time format.
Duplicate transaction: Transaction ID already exists in the system.
Invalid customer ID: Customer ID does not exist in the system.
usage: Provide all required transaction details to validate the transaction meets system requirements before processing for loyalty points.

is_valid.description: Whether the transaction passed all validation checks

error_details.description: List of specific validation errors if any
